Job Title: Agency Finance Associate

Location: New York, United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Finance, Sales

Description:
At Benchworks, our team is built with purpose. We are seeking candidates who are motivated, passionate, and confident to work in an entrepreneurial environment. Our goal is to provide a space where you can collaborate with a wide variety of individuals while being offered opportunities to do great things for patients, their loved ones, and their healthcare professionals. 
The Client Finance Associate should have a strong financial background working on job costing and working closely with project managers managing client work. This person in this role reports to the Client Finance Manager.
The Client Finance Team ensures the full-cycle financial health of all clients. Responsibilities include job set-up and maintenance, process billing, attend Burn Report Meetings, AR follow up, and assist with month end close. The Client Finance Associate will support the Team, complete ad hoc requests as they come up, and assist with meeting preparation and follow ups.
ResponsibilitiesJob Set-up and MaintenanceOpen new jobs in WorkBook based on information submitted in Job Request FormsAdd jobs to finance trackers as they are openedAdd price quotes and open vendor POs in WorkBook as neededBurn Report MeetingsAlong with Client Finance Manager, attend biweekly Burn Report Meetings with Project and Account Managers- assist with any meeting prep or takeaways.Prepare accrual documents for clients as needed based on what is reviewed in burn meetingsClient BillingEnsure all cost and time transfer requests, identified during the meeting, are completed prior to billingEnsure billing is approved and completed in a timely manner and within client billing deadlinesEnsure all necessary billing back-up required by the client is compiledEnsure delivery and receipt of client billing documentationAR Management:Regularly review AR Aging and assist in collectionsBe a resource for the team in applying client cash receipts correctlyMonth End CloseDeferral/Accrual analysisClose jobs/ adjust end dates as neededAssist in completing month end reportingRequirementsAt least two years of working experience in finance or accounting in an hours-based service industry (e.g., advertising/marketing agency, architecture firm, law office, etc.)Proficient in MS Excel and MS WordDetail oriented and highly organizedAbility to take direction and work effectively with Finance leadershipExcellent oral and written communication skillsAbility to work effectively in a team environmentAdditional informationAbout BW Health GroupBW Health Group is a family of interconnected companies dedicated to supporting and building partnerships with life sciences companies. BW Health Group is led by industry brand executives and strategists whose goal is to help clients and their brands navigate an ever-evolving healthcare system.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
